item.description:
Beginner Kayaking, Picnic

Sunday June 19th.

Kayaking from 11 am. or any time til around 2 pm.

IF IT RAINS, SNOWS OR IS JUST TOO COLD? THIS EVENT IS CANCELED!

A reservation was placed for a warm sunny day.

 PICNIC: BYOD & FOOD 4 YOURSELF

A DOG AND KID FRIENDLY EVENT!

RENTAL KAYAKS $5 HR. for a one or a two seat boats.

Have your own boat? No problem, but there is a $5. parking fee for those not renting.

Edgewater Canoe & Kayak

35 Edgewater drive hooksett , NH.

Please reserve your boat.

Call Rob at 603-540-6520 or 603-485-9251 He will return your call.

Host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net Steve Obermiller.

 

     Bring the friends, kids and dogs, and please join Steve O. and friends. Lets go kayaking! This is great setting for new people to the sport, or for the old kayakers. It is a low cost easy setting for renting and parking, easy in, easy out. So, people can learn or improve their kayaking skills, and enjoy themselves at the same time. The river is wide and easy to move along. This is also a good opportunity to see if you like the sport. If you need to rent? Please, call ahead and reserve your boat. Sunday looks to be nice and sunny. We will up river and paddle by the park in Pembroke. We will stop and eat there. Everyone bring their own food and drinks. There at the park, we can sit and have our picnic lunch and take a short break. You can go back from there. But, we plan to go up river a little longer, or until 1:30 pm. Then head back down river .

Edgewater has many different types of rentals at only $5/ hour, or $25 for the day. The same price for either a one seat or a two seat boat. Plus, you can take the rental anywhere at anytime. So lets have some fun on the water. bring your sunscreen, cameras ,water, food, snacks, bug spray and smiles.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Beginning Kayaking, Picnic
